author: Timothy Rapp
title: Rich Paul's Klutch Sports Acquires Tidal Sports; Agency Represents Bregman, More
description: Rich Paul's Klutch Sports agency announced the acquisition of Tidal Sports on Friday:          Tidal Sports' clients  include  Houston Astros superstar Alex Bregman ,  New York Mets ...
content:
Mark Brown/Getty Images
Rich Paul's Klutch Sports agency announced the acquisition of Tidal Sports on Friday:
Klutch Sports Group@KlutchSportsKlutch Sports is proud to announce the acquisition of Tidal Sports is finalized and would like to formally welcome … [+899 chars]
